Sanjana Sanghi Wiki | Height | Movies | Photos | Biography | Age

Bolly Reporter
11 months ago

Sanjana Sanghi is an Indian Actress and Model. She was born on 2 September 1996 in Delhi, India. Her family includes her parents – Father Sandeep Sanghi is a businessman & a company director. Her grandfather’s name is Ratan Lal Sanghi. When she graduated Class XII in 2014, she was congratulated by former TV Actress & Indian HRD Minister Smriti Irani.

Sanjana Sanghi movies

Sanjana Sanghi was made her on-screen debut with film ‘Rockstar’ (2011). She was all of 14 when she played the role of younger sister of Heer (Nargis Fakhri) in Imtiaz Ali’s Rockstar (2011). Her character name was ‘Mandy’ in this movie. She followed that with a brief appearance as a younger Meeta in 2017’s Hindi Medium and in the same year, she played Katty in Fukrey Returns.
